# Function: isSupportedChain()

> **isSupportedChain**(`chainId`): `boolean`

Defined in: [src/utils/chains.ts:54](https://github.com/jcam1/sdks/blob/e250c1c73d308610832de5eeca0f586adc98f249/packages/core/src/utils/chains.ts#L54)

Checks if the specified chain is supported by the SDK.

#### chainId

## Returns
